name: Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato sauce, cheese, pepperoni, and mushrooms.

name: Sushi
description: Traditional Japanese sushi with raw fish, rice, seaweed, and soy sauce.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh salad with lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Hamburger
description: Juicy beef patty on a bun with lettuce, tomato, cheese, ketchup, and mustard.

name: Pad Thai
description: Thai stir-fried noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, eggs, and peanuts.

name: Mushroom
description: Creamy Italian risotto with mushrooms, onion, and parmesan cheese.

name: Alfredo Pasta
description: Creamy Alfredo pasta with tender pieces of chicken, garlic, and parmesan cheese.

name: Margherita
description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, cherry tomatoes, and basil leaves.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Grilled salmon fillet served with a side of steamed vegetables and lemon wedges.
